title: My Two Dads - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   School Life   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Adopted Children   Calm Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Childcare   Cute Story   Devoted Love Interests   Domestic Affairs   Doting Parents   Familial Love   Family   Famous Parents   Female Protagonist   Heartwarming   Marriage   Modern Day
author: 有酒
description:
My name is Yang Han.

My dad’s surname is ‘Yang’ and my other dad’s surname is ‘Han’.

My dad is the nation’s husband who lives actively on Weibo’s hot search.

My dad is a legendary hacker, crowned as the ‘Master of Pwn’ after leading his team to win the championship twice.

I’m an ordinary (?) high-school female student.

This is a story of two fathers worrying over their precious daughter’s growth, told from the daughter's pov.>
